rooms.description: An open-concept living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, incorporating eco-friendly materials. The entrance is aligned in the north-east as per Vastu principles for positive energy.
Integrated dining and kitchen space with an open layout, sustainable fixtures, and a central island. The design includes a window placement ensuring proper ventilation and natural light.
A guest room featuring eco-friendly insulation and soundproofing materials. The room is positioned to maintain privacy while still aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Includes storage, laundry, and utility areas designed for efficient water recycling and waste management systems.

openings.details: Main entrance aligned in the north-east to invite positive energy. Incorporates sliding glass doors with floor-to-ceiling design.
Extensive use of floor-to-ceiling windows throughout for enhanced natural lighting and ventilation. Windows are double-glazed for improved insulation.
Outdoor balcony space overlooking the garden, facilitating relaxation and fresh air circulation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for a serene ambience, positioned in the south-west as per Vastu. Features eco-friendly flooring and energy-efficient climate control.
Cozy bedroom space with natural ventilation, soundproof walls for a quiet environment, aligned in the north-west zone as per Vastu to promote calmness.
Dedicated home office designed with optimal natural lighting and floor-to-ceiling windows. The layout is ergonomic, using sustainable materials for a productive environment.
Compact bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and water-saving systems. Located adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience while aligning with Vastu guidelines.

openings.details: Balcony space providing a view of the garden and promoting natural airflow, contributing to energy efficiency.
Continuation of floor-to-ceiling windows on all sides for optimal light and ventilation. Uses high-performance glass to enhance insulation.
